alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Liberty; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 14 at 4:06PM EDT until August 14 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... Northeastern Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 406 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Crawfordville, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Crawfordville, Sopchoppy, Panacea-Wakulla Airport, Arran, Mcintyre, Sanborn, Tully, Panacea, Smith Creek, Medart, Buckhorn, Spring Creek and Curtis Mill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
